title: LAIR ORB / wearing revolutionary hat
description: Putting the hat on gives a one time +1 to Mazovian Socio-Economics, you communist failure.

dialogueTree.title: Rhetoric: "This hat is so soft, so warm. It wr..."
dialogueTree.english: This hat is so soft, so warm. It wraps around your head... and your mind tingles with all manner of socio-economic theory.
dialogueTree.polish: Ta czapka jest taka miękka i ciepła. Otula twoją głowę... i umieszcza w niej rozmaite rozmyślania o teorii socjoekonomicznej.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Гэта шапка такая мяккая і цёплая. Ахутвае тваю галаву... і размяшчае ў ёй разнастайныя разважанні аб тэорыі сацыяэканамічнай.

links.title: You: "This is an *ushanka*, right? (Pat t..."
links.english: This is an *ushanka*, right? (Pat the hat.)

links.title: Rhetoric: "Kras Mazov would have worn this ush..."
links.english: Kras Mazov would have worn this ushanka. Mazov knew where to cook those thoughts, that's why it bears a Mazovian logo.
links.polish: Taką uszankę chętnie nosiłby Kras Mazow. Wiedział on, czym rozgrzewać myśli. Dlatego też widnieje na niej mazowskie logo.
links.belarusian: Такую шапку-з-вушамі з задавальненнем насіў бы Крас Мазоў. Ён ведаў, чым сагрэць думкі. Таму на ёй змешчаны мазавецкі лагатып.

links.title: Rhetoric: "Glory to the Revolution, comrade! W..."
links.english: Glory to the Revolution, comrade! Whether you like it or not, wearing this hat has made you more communist.
links.polish: Chwała rewolucji, towarzyszu! Czy ci się to podoba, czy nie, noszenie tej czapki uczyniło cię bardziej komunistą.
links.belarusian: Хвала рэвалюцыі, таварыш! Ці падабаецца табе гэта ці не, нашэнне гэтай шапкі зрабіла цябе больш камуністам.

links.title: You: "Oops, it's a fashion faux pas! [Dis..."
links.english: Oops, it's a fashion faux pas! [Discard the thought -- and the hat.]
links.polish: Ojej, to modowe faux pas! [Odrzuć myśl. Czapkę też].
links.belarusian: Ой, гэта модны промах! [Адкінь думку. Шапку таксама].

links.title: Rhetoric: "Let's hope no one saw you wearing t..."
links.english: Let's hope no one saw you wearing that outrageously communist hat.
links.polish: Miejmy nadzieję, że nikt nie widział, jak nosisz tę skandalicznie komunistyczną czapkę.
links.belarusian: Спадзяюся, ніхто не бачыў, як ты носіш гэтую скандальна камуністычную шапку.
